Articles.Content: What new things do you think should be in MLB 16 The Show?
I'm not into Sports Games, never heard of this series, but I'm a fan of the Pirates, so I'd have to say more things about the Pirates. 50% of the game should be about the Bucs.
A game that's actually different from the last one.
I would want to manually challenge plays.
I don't really think I should be posting this on KSP Forum.
Jose Bautista's bat flip from last night's game. And a one-in-a-million chance that when tossing the ball back to the catcher you'll hit the batter's bat.
